entity.name: The Pentagon
entity.description: Headquarters of the United States Department of Defense, the Pentagon

text: Trump says of Capt. Crozier being relieved of his post for criticizing Pentagon leadership over their handling of the coronavirus outbreak: "I thought it was terrible what he did. To write a letter? I mean, this isn't a class on literature."
